task.title: Monitor Physical Port
task.shortdesc: If there is a problem on the FXO port, FXS port or GSM channel, you can use the Port Monitor Tool to monitor the port, and download the packet to analyze it.

step.cmd: Go to Maintenance Troubleshooting Port Monitor Tool .
Choose the Port that has a problem.

step.info: The PBX will start to monitor the port. During this time, you should duplicate the problem of the port.

step.cmd: Click Stop to stop capturing packets.
Click Download to download the file.

info.p: Decompress the .tar file and use Audition software to open the .raw file and analyze it.
